answers.answer: Hi,You’re suffering from erectile dysfunction and for the same you need an evaluation to look for an underlying cause of the same and thus will suggest you to consult a physician. Some common diseases which can cause the same are diabetes, hypertension & neurological problems. But one of the commonest is the psychological erectile dysfunction. There are drugs like Viagra which can help in improving the chances of having an erection & sustaining it but it should be taken after medical consultation only. I sincerely hope that helps. Take care.

question: I had some prostate problem about two years ago. I have overcome it through exercise to a great extent.For the last two/three months I find that my penis gets bent down from the girth and does not catch upfull length and hardness. I am 70 years. I do not find much of prostrate problem. What could be the reason oflack of erection and bending of the penis?Bujha Singh
title: Bending of Penis
